name: bored
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 feeling unhappy because something is not interesting or because you have nothing to do, or showing that you feel like this: It was a cold, wet day and the children were bored.bored with I am beginning to get bored with eating salad.bored of She was getting bored of listening to the same thing every day. There was a bored expression on her face. Thirty bored students looked back at me.
